resources.string: Khadamati is a fast, secure, and user-friendly platform that connects users with trusted service providers to simplify daily payments.
Details about the University (location, type, etc.)
Your security is our top priority. At Khadamati, we use best practices to keep your information safe and your transactions protected.

"How we protect you:

" "1. Data Encryption: All your data is encrypted using AES-256 encryption.

" "2. Secure Payments: Every transaction id processed through certain secure gateways.

" "3. Two-Factor Authentication (2DFA): Add an extra layer of protection to your account.

" "4. Real-time Transaction Monitoring: We monitor transactions to detect and prevent suspicious activity.

"

1. We never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

 2. All payment details are securely stored and tokenized.

 3. You control what data you share and can manage permissions anytime.

"
How much would you rate Khadamati?
Your honest feedback matters a lot!

"Please review and accept our Terms and Conditions before signing up:

" + "1. You must be at least 18 years old and legally eligible to use this app.

" + "2. You are responsible for your account, including all transactions and keeping your credentials secure.

" + "3. Illegal use is strictly prohibited — including fraud, money laundering, or unauthorized transfers.

" + "4. Fees may apply for specific transactions, transfers, or account services. These will be disclosed when applicable.

" + "5. We may suspend or terminate your account for policy violations or suspicious activity.

"
Write here. Press enter after you finish.
Hey! Download Khadamati – a one-for-all app for your payments.

1. You must be 18+ and legally eligible.
2. You are responsible for your account.
3. Illegal activity is prohibited.
4. Fees may apply.
5. We may suspend your account.
Khadamati is a secure, user-friendly platform connecting users to service providers for daily payments.

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Any data you share, such as your email, profile image, or payment info, is securely stored and never shared with third parties without your consent.
We use your information solely to provide services, improve your user experience, and maintain account security. You have full control over your data and can request updates or deletion at any time.
By using our app, you agree to this policy. Updates will be notified directly in the app or via email.

Your security is our top priority. We use encryption, secure servers, and verification layers to protect your account and transactions.
Passwords are never stored in plain text and sensitive actions like payments are handled through secure connections.
For your protection: - Use strong, unique passwords. - Avoid sharing credentials. - Enable updates to receive security patches.
If you suspect suspicious activity, contact our support immediately.
